text: And put your trust in the Living One Who does not die and make glorifications ensconced in His praise in other words say subhāna’Llāhi wa’l-hamdu li’Llāh ‘Glory be to God and praise be to God’. And He suffices as One Aware as Knower of the sins of His servants khabīran ‘One Aware’ is semantically connected to bi-dhunūbi ‘of the sins’.
